channel.title: Anthropic News
channel.description: Latest news and announcements from Anthropic

item.title: Anthropic invests $50 billion in American AI infrastructure

item.title: Anthropic partners with Rwandan Government and ALX to bring AI education to hundreds of thousands of learners across Africa

item.title: Microsoft, NVIDIA, and Anthropic announce strategic partnerships

item.title: Claude now available in Microsoft Foundry and Microsoft 365 Copilot
item.description: Claude now available in Microsoft Foundry and Microsoft 365 Copilot

item.title: Anthropic acquires Bun as Claude Code reaches $1B milestone
item.description: Anthropic acquires Bun as Claude Code reaches $1B milestone

item.title: Introducing Claude Opus 4.5
item.description: The best model in the world for coding, agents, and computer use, with meaningful improvements to everyday tasks like slides and spreadsheets. Claude Opus 4.5 delivers frontier performance and dramatically improved token efficiency.

item.title: Introducing Claude Sonnet 4.5
item.description: Claude Sonnet 4.5 sets new benchmark records in coding, reasoning, and computer use while being Anthropic's most aligned model, accompanied by the release of the Claude Agent SDK for building capable agents

item.title: Introducing Claude Haiku 4.5
item.description: Claude Haiku 4.5 matches state-of-the-art coding capabilities from months ago while delivering unprecedented speed and cost-efficiency for complex tasks.

item.title: Anthropic raises $13B Series F at $183B post-money valuation
item.description: Anthropic raised $13 billion in a Series F round at a $183 billion valuation to expand enterprise offerings, safety research, and international growth as revenue grew from $1 billion to over $5 billion in eight months.

item.title: Thoughts on Americaâ€™s AI Action Plan
item.description: Anthropic's response to the White House AI Action Plan supports infrastructure and safety measures while calling for stronger export controls and transparency requirements to maintain American AI leadership.
